meanings.definition: To make (someone) familiar with or knowledgeable about something.
meanings.sent1: I will familiarize you with the new rules.
meanings.sent2: She familiarized herself with the city map before the trip.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to familiarize itself with human emotions.
meanings.sent4: The book familiarized me with the history of ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent5: Let's familiarize ourselves with the safety procedures before starting the experiment.

meanings.definition: To make (something) known or familiar to someone.
meanings.sent1: He will familiarize the team with the project details.
meanings.sent2: The teacher familiarized the students with the new vocabulary words.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried to familiarize the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent4: The tour guide familiarized the visitors with the historical landmarks.
meanings.sent5: The video tutorial will familiarize you with the software features.
